Synopsis: Michael (James Woods) and Linda (Glenn Close) are a married upper-class couple unable to conceive a child. After speaking to an adoption agency, they meet a pregnant 17-year-old named Lucy (Mary Stuart Masterson) and her boyfriend, Sam (Kevin Dillon). Financially unable to provide for the baby herself, Lucy agrees to be a surrogate mother for the desperate couple. But as her pregnancy progresses, Lucy reconsiders the decision to give up her child.
Title: Immediate Family
